content.description: A short variable size (mostly hands) crack. The crux is awkward and near the top. Be sure of yourself if you choose to boulder it. This crack really isn't worth the trouble due to the short nature of the climb, awkward crux, long scramble back down, heinous approach through hostile plants, and obscure location.
content.protection: Takes medium size pro. Small to medium gear for a top anchor.
content.location: Found on the lower flank of Flag Pole, near the park boundary. It is clearly visible from Sandy Creek.

content.description: This is intended as a place to post miscellaneous problems that don't really below to specific areas.
